system.description:
Effect: Set Up: the user gains Marked 6, and +2 DEF and SPDEF stages for 2 activations.
Resolution: On the user's next Activation, they target a valid creature, dealing twice the damage they took since declaring Bide to the target. Bide gains [Danger Close].
